Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a red-brown pottery vessel, the exterior is covered with a self-slip and faint traces of six lines of black-painted Arabic text.
Curator's comments: Marked in black on the interior 'ABYDOS 25 / Redim 1000'.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393819) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393819)
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: O.BM Abydos Arab. 3 (Edition abbreviation according to Oates et al. 2001)
